enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before performing any transfer operations.
Parameter validation is necessary to ensure the integrity of the transfer request.
The queryUniversalTransfer method can be used to verify the status of the transfer after it has been initiated.

enhanced_by.method_name: sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: The sendSignedRequest method is directly related to the execution of the transfer request and can be used to assert the request's success.
